Viking.text:
Wind
In west, westerly backing southwesterly 4 to 6, occasionally 7 at first and later. In east, cyclonic 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9, becoming southerly or southwesterly 4 to 6, occasionally 7 later.
Sea state
In west, moderate or rough. in east, moderate or rough, occasionally very rough at first.
Weather
In west, showers. In east, rain.
Visibility
In west, good. In east, good, occasionally poor.
